metadata.job_to_be_done: Plan a trip of 4 days for a group of 10 college friends.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: • Use Packing Cubes: Organize clothes and maximize space. • Wear Bulky Items: Wear bulky items like coats or boots during travel to save suitcase space. • Pack a Day Bag: Bring a small day bag for daily excursions. • Leave Room for Souvenirs: Leave extra space or bring a foldable bag for souvenirs. • Additional Tips: Pack a small travel umbrella, a reusable shopping bag, and a portable phone charger.

Packing for a trip to the South of France involves considering the season, planned activities, and the needs of both adults and children. By following this comprehensive guide and incorporating the tips and tricks provided, you'll be well-prepared for a comfortable and enjoyable trip. Remember to pack light, versatile clothing, and essential items to make the most of your travel experience.
